com.esri.mo2.svr.map
Class DisplayList

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.svr.map.DisplayList
public class DisplayList
extends Object

This class represents a value object that holds each layer's display-related information such as layer visibility, transparency, and renderers. It gives server map capability tp hold a set of display information without overriding its default configuration. In a stateless environment, developers should use this class set each layer's display-related information before calling server Map's drawing and getImage methods.
